climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Pürdoux Hand and Face Wipes for Babies and Children are enriched with natural chamomile & aloe vera plant extracts for gentle cleaning of baby's hands, face and diaper areas. Our children's wipes are made with ultra-soft, 100% pure cotton to nourish sooth and moisturize your baby's delicate skin. Made without the use of harmful chemicals such as alcohol, latex, chlorine, artificial colors or scents.
This box contains 120 Wet Hand and Face Wipes, packaged in 12 resealable sachets, each sachet containing 10 wet wipes.
High quality 100% pure cotton wet wipes with high absorbency level
Soft and gentle to be used on hands, faces, and diaper areas to clean and nourish delicate skin
Alcohol-free, latex-free, chlorine-free, dye-free, Made with natural ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Chamomile
body.description: Pürdoux Hand and Face Wipes for Babies and Children are enriched with natural chamomile & aloe vera plant extracts for gentle cleaning of baby's hands, face and diaper areas. Our children's wipes are made with ultra-soft, 100% pure cotton to nourish sooth and moisturize your baby's delicate skin. Made without the use of harmful chemicals such as alcohol, latex, chlorine, artificial colors or scents. This box contains 12 sachets with 10 pure cotton wipes each high quality 100% pure cotton wipes with high absorbency level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for school and outdoor type activities.
reviews.reviewText: We love these! My youngest still uses wipes and these small packages are perfect for throwing in a backpack or purse. He always has one in his backpack and I make sure to throw one in my purse when we have long days planned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A better baby wipe
reviews.reviewText: Our granddaughter appears to like the soft cotton and there is plenty of moisture for cleaning up whatever needs to be cleaned up. My daughter and her husband are very concerned about using only natural and sustainable. They read the packaging, checked out the ingredients and took an entire pack home with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these wipes
reviews.reviewText: Extremely convenient, no overbearing odor to them, they come in handy everywhere

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars When I go to a fast food place and the table looks disgusting I use the other ones
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to throw in my purse and wipe my hands before/after meals. They work well for that purpose, but I don't really get a disinfected feeling from them. I'm used to the wet naps that you get at a BBQ place that have that lemony clean smell and are stronger. Now I use both for different purposes. When I'm just looking to wipe my hands down real quick, I use these. When I go to a fast food place and the table looks disgusting I use the other ones. Basically these are great for light cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely to carry in your handbag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal for great wipes!
reviews.reviewText: Highly highly recommend these wipes! First of all they are so cheap! Second they are so soft! We ran out and picked up some baby wipes from the grocery store and I was quickly reminded why we don’t use those. My daughter needs them to clean her face and the packages are so small they fit perfectly in her backpack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020
reviews.reviewText: What a nice way to clean up your hands or freshen up your face. We keep them in the car and use them after we've been running around or going in and out of busy places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars no good for the price pay
reviews.reviewText: i don't like nothing is too small buy paper towel much cheaper
